original_text: So you must obey the people who have authority to rule. You must obey them not only so that they do not punish you. You must obey them because it is right to obey them. And you yourselves know that this is right.
korean_text: 그러므로 복종하지 아니할 수 없으니 진노 때문에 할 것이 아니라 양심을 따라 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: So you must obey the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 그 사람들을 순종해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: You must obey them not only
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들에게 순종해야만 하는 것은 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: so that they do not punish you
it is right to obey them
